entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Rock Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:26 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 5 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
